org.fluidity.composition.spi

Interface ContainerTermination.Jobs<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - identifies the dependent component's class a particular instance belongs to; used to match class loaders.
    Enclosing interface:
    ContainerTermination

    public static interface ContainerTermination.Jobs<T>
    Maintains the list of jobs on behalf of a ContainerTermination component. This component is implemented by Fluid Tools and the ContainerTermination implementation is expected to use it.

    The type parameter is used to gain access to the ContainerTermination component using this component in order to verify that no job added to this component is loaded by a class loader less stable than that of the ContainerTermination component; i.e., the class loader of all jobs added must be the same as, or in the ancestry of, the class loader of the ContainerTermination component.

    NOTE: Do not use this component, only implement it when integrating a new termination mechanism to Fluid Tools; use ContainerTermination instead.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void add(Command.Job<Exception> job)
      Adds a job to the list.
      void flush()
      Executes the jobs in reverse addition order.
      void remove(Command.Job<Exception> job)
      Removes a job from the list.

    • Method Detail

      • flush

        void flush()
        Executes the jobs in reverse addition order. The executed jobs are then removed from the list.

      • add

        void add(Command.Job<Exception> job)
        Adds a job to the list.
        Parameters:
        job - the job to add.

      • remove

        void remove(Command.Job<Exception> job)
        Removes a job from the list.
        Parameters:
        job - the job to remove.
